HERO_SECTION.TITLE: Harness the Power of Crypto Trading Automation
HERO_SECTION.TEXT: It's Only the Beginning! Join a Trading Platform that Makes Advanced Trading Accessible to All.
HERO_SECTION.LABEL: You are One Click Away

BUILT_ON_SECTION.TITLE: Built on Transparency. Powered by Trust.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.TEXT: Transparency and accountability form the foundation of Remora's trading community. That's why we provide financial metrics and performance data on our leaders to all members. See the metrics that matter. View detailed performance data including how much the followers of individual leaders have made, rather than how much the leader is making themselves
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_1_TEXT: Copy the trades of experienced investors and view their detailed crypto performance.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_2_TITLE: Investing Platform Housed in a Community.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_2_TEXT: So much more than just a trading platform. It is a leading collaborative community.
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_3_TITLE: Success Fee and Simple Leader Subscription Fee
BUILT_ON_SECTION.CARD_3_TEXT: No Hidden Fees and No Extra Charges.Try it now for FREE!

POWER_SECTION.TITLE: Power of Community
POWER_SECTION.TEXT: A transparent social trading platform enabling every trader to automatically mirror top-performing crypto investors' in real time.
POWER_SECTION.CARD_2_TEXT: Invest with confidence by mimicking the top traders you believe in.
POWER_SECTION.CARD_3_TEXT: Preset Stop Loss risk mitigation feature

HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.TITLE: How it Works
HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.STEP_1_TOOLTIP: Create your Remora profile and link your Binance account
HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.STEP_2_TOOLTIP: Review leader board and choose  a leader/s
HOW_IT_WORKS_SECTION.STEP_3_TOOLTIP: Dedicate funds and Copy-Trade your leader/s

ONE_APP_SECTION.TITLE: One App. Unlimited Possibilities.
ONE_APP_SECTION.TEXT: We're making crypto investing accessible to everyone, everywhere, enabling you to trade on a mobile app designed for usability and optimized for capability with an intuitive UI for fast and frictionless crypto trading investing.
ONE_APP_SECTION.FEATURE1: Get Easy and reliable crypto-reading features at your fingertips.
ONE_APP_SECTION.FEATURE2: Access a complete picture of your trades' performance and metrics. Anytime, anywhere!

Q_AND_A_SECTION.TITLE: Frequently asked questions
Q_AND_A_SECTION.TEXT: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a pag
Q_AND_A_SECTION.ANSWER1: Copy trading is an innovative vision that allows users and new traders to 'copy' the trades of a skilled investor automatically without extra effort or a great experience- helping new traders gain from the wisdom of the crowd and top investors to share their knowledge for income.
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION2: What makes copy trading an excellent tool for new investors?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION4: Is there a way for me to pick a leader to copy?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION5: How long does it take for a copied trade to appear in my trades?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION6: How much will copy trading cost me?
Q_AND_A_SECTION.QUESTION7: What is the minimum amount needed to copy another trader?
